heading: HB01860
0: AN ACT REQUIRING MOBILE SERVICES PROVIDERS ANDMOBILE DEVICE MANUFACTURERS TO PROVIDE THEIR CONSUMERS THE CAPABILITY TO REMOTELY DELETE DATA FROM THEIR MOBILE DEVICES AND RENDER SUCH DEVICES INOPERABLE
status: Pending with the Committee on INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY since 2016-08-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01860
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING MOBILE SERVICES PROVIDERS ANDMOBILE DEVICE MANUFACTURERS TO PROVIDE THEIR CONSUMERS THE CAPABILITY TO REMOTELY DELETE DATA FROM THEIR MOBILE DEVICES AND RENDER SUCH DEVICES INOPERABLE

DATE FILED : 2016-07-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
